Atif Aslam.description: Atif Aslam is a highly acclaimed Pakistani playback singer composer and actor celebrated for his soulful voice and remarkable versatility Born on March 12 1983 he first gained recognition with his debut album Jal Pari and soon became a Bollywood sensation with chart topping hits His melodious and emotionally resonant songs such as Tera Hone Laga Hoon Dil Diyan Gallan and Tu Jaane Na have captivated audiences worldwide With numerous awards and international performances Atif continues to be a dominant force in the music industry inspiring millions with his musical prowess
songs: Tera Hone Laga Hoon (Ajab Prem Ki Ghazab Kahani)
Tu Jaane Na (Ajab Prem Ki Ghazab Kahani)

Arijit Singh.description: Arijit Singh is an award winning Indian playback singer and music composer known for his soulful and versatile voice Born on April 25 1987 he gained widespread fame with Tum Hi Ho from Aashiqui 2 and became a leading voice in Bollywood His emotional depth and powerful renditions have made songs like Channa Mereya Raabta and Gerua iconic With numerous accolades and a global fan following Arijit continues to redefine contemporary Indian music with his exceptional vocal skills and heartfelt performances

Jubin Nautiyal.description: Jubin Nautiyal is a popular Indian playback singer known for his soulful voice and versatility across various music genres Born on June 14 1989 he gained recognition with hits like Zindagi Kuch Toh Bata and Meherbani His melodious tracks such as Raataan Lambiyan Tum Hi Aana and Lut Gaye have made him one of the most sought after singers in Bollywood With multiple awards and a strong fan following Jubin continues to deliver chart topping songs mesmerizing audiences with his deep emotive singing style
